title: Man behind viral blue-black dress photo charged with attempted murder of wife
description: Scotland resident Keir Johnston faces accusations of years of domestic violence culminating in an attempt on his wife’s life.

title: Wagner fighters are in Belarus and training Belarusian troops
description: A video showing the mercenaries training Belarusian conscripts was the first official confirmation that the group is present there after rebelling against Russia last month.

title: Blinken in Southeast Asia to build support for China rivalry
description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken met with Southeast Asian counterparts in Indonesia as the U.S. seeks to bolster its regional ties amid China tensions.

title: Canadian firefighter dies battling blaze in British Columbia
description: Officials have called for more help as the province suffers what could be its worst wildfire season in a century.

title: Actors’ unions around the world offer solidarity amid strike
description: Actors everywhere are facing “long-standing, shared fights” over issues such as residual payments, and new challenges including artificial intelligence.

title: To defeat Russia, Ukraine’s top commander pushes to fight on his terms
description: Gen. Valery Zaluzhny said in a rare interview that he has used Ukrainian-made weapons to strike inside Russia as he seeks to work around conditions on weapons supplied by the West.

title: At least 100 dead in northern India after extreme monsoon flooding
description: Climate change is bringing more erratic and dangerous monsoons even as unrestricted building is making mountains more prone to landslides, warn experts.

title: In photos: Monsoons flood India’s Delhi as river rises to record levels
description: The monsoons came a week early to India and Delhi's Yamuna River reached record levels after flooding the city.

title: Sam Kerr mania heats up as Australia readies to co-host soccer World Cup
description: The global success of its star player has helped turn Australia into a haven for women's soccer — a surprise for a nation known for its devotion to other sports.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Wagner no longer significant in Ukraine, Pentagon says; Kyiv receives cluster munitions
description: Most of Wagner Group remains in Russian-occupied areas of Ukraine but is “no longer contributing as a significant combat capability,” a Pentagon spokesman said.

title: World has 165 million more poor as debt consumes governments’ funds
description: Some of the world’s poorest countries borrowed heavily since 2020 to cope with the pandemic, soaring food and fuel bills caused by the war in Ukraine, and inflation.

title: There’s no escaping climate change as extreme weather events abound
description: Record heat waves and weather disasters may become routine as climate change continues to scorch the planet.
